ComicInfo.Summary: To confirm his dreams of Al, Terry searches the alleys for his dead friend. When Cog intercepts and questions Terry about his motives, he ends up mediating their encounter and saving Terry from Al's jealous rage. After Terry shows Al proof of the case he has against Wynn, Spawn helps Terry on a dangerous mission. Meanwhile, Sam & Twitch wait for the "informant" regarding information regarding information about the Chief Banks - Senator Jennings conspiracy.
